content.raw: Ok, so I’ve confirmed the devices only have a concept of absolute position if they have been homed since they were last powered on. However, they can tell you whether this is the case. I’ll make the BLACS tab check this before moving them, and refuse to move them if they have not been homed. I’ll add a button to the front panel to home each device.
content.html: Ok, so I’ve confirmed the devices only have a concept of absolute position if they have been homed since they were last powered on. However, they can tell you whether this is the case. I’ll make the BLACS tab check this before moving them, and refuse to move them if they have not been homed. I’ll add a button to the front panel to home each device.
